article_title: Monte del Sol senior making a name as one of state’s top sprinters
article_text:

og.description: Hunter Ferguson, who runs for the Jaguars because his home school does not have a track-and-field program, has proven himself as one of Class AAAA’s top 100-meter performers.
og.title: Monte del Sol senior making a name as one of state’s top sprinters
